name: Shadow Path (Secretive Games)
description:
Shadow Path is a 2D pixel art action platform game. Where you play the Shadow, who strives to bring the world back into balance.

EXCITING ADVENTURE

There was a universal explosion, and no one knows why, but the runes that protected the world from dangers were scattered all over the world. You have to return all the runes and defeat the evil that appeared as a result of the explosion of the universe.

PECULIARITIES

- 3 acts

- 30 different interesting levels

- at the end of each act, the Boss awaits you

- 15 types of enemies such as: skeletons, archers, wolves, flying mice and others

- 10 types of traps

- a store where you can purchase a Shadow that has higher stats

- nice soundtrack

- NPC who will give you a task

To control, use the buttons:

 AD / arrows (to move),

space bar / W / C / up arrow to jump,

LeftCtrl / RightCtrl / X / E to attack with a sword,

and LeftShift / RightShift / Z / R for a fireball attack.

To exit the menu, you can press ESC, as well as click on the pause button in the upper left corner of the screen.

To finish the level, you need to find the Transition Stone.
